references.paper_title: Predicting COVID-19 Pneumonia Severity on Chest X-ray With Deep Learning
references.reason: This paper is a foundational study on predicting COVID-19 severity from chest X-rays using deep learning, providing a benchmark for subsequent research.

references.paper_title: BS-Net: Learning COVID-19 pneumonia severity on a large chest X-ray dataset
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel deep learning model (BS-Net) specifically designed for predicting COVID-19 severity from chest X-rays, contributing a significant advancement in the field.

references.paper_title: An efficient mixture of deep and machine learning models for COVID-19 diagnosis in chest X-ray images
references.reason: This study offers a hybrid approach combining deep and machine learning techniques for COVID-19 diagnosis from chest X-rays, enhancing diagnostic accuracy and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Frequency and Distribution of Chest Radiographic Findings in Patients Positive for COVID-19
references.reason: This paper provides crucial insights into the prevalence and characteristics of chest radiographic findings in COVID-19 patients, informing the development and validation of machine learning models.

references.paper_title: Toward understanding COVID-19 pneumonia: a deep-learning-based approach for severity analysis and monitoring the disease
references.reason: This research explores deep learning techniques for analyzing COVID-19 pneumonia severity, contributing a comprehensive approach for disease understanding and monitoring.
